item.title: End-of-Year Postdoc Luncheon
item.author: postdoc@ucr.edu (UCR PostdocAssoc)
item.description:
The UC Riverside Postdoctoral Association (RPA) is hosting an End-of-year Postdoc Luncheon on December 8 at 12:30 pm in the UCR Botanic Garden meeting room. Come and celebrate another year of hard work together! ðŸ¥³

Postdoctoral scholars, visiting scholars, project scientist, and their families are welcome.

ðŸ“„ Please register by filling out this form . Lunch will be provided at no cost to attendees.
